meta.purpose: UI/UX mockup for a family TV guide app profile selection screen - the 'Who's Watching?' page
meta.notes_for_model: This is the Netflix-style profile selection screen but with more personality and warmth. Think of entering a cozy family living room where everyone has their own special spot. The design should feel personal, playful, yet premium.

story.one_sentence_brief: A warm, inviting profile selection screen displaying family member avatars in rounded square cards against a deep dark background with subtle ambient light orbs, asking 'Who's watching tonight?' in elegant serif typography.
story.additional_context: This is the first interaction with the app interior after login. It should feel warm, personal, and slightly playful while maintaining the premium cinema aesthetic. Each profile represents a family member with their own avatar and viewing preferences.

scene.subject: A centered profile selection interface showing 4 family profile cards arranged horizontally, each with a rounded-square avatar container displaying different playful icons (cat, star, rocket, flower), profile names below, and optional maturity badges. Above the profiles is the headline 'Who's watching tonight?' in elegant serif typography.
secondary_subjects: Full Family TV Guide wordmark logo at the top
Subtle ambient gradient orbs in the background (gold and teal at very low opacity)
An 'Add Profile' card with dashed border and plus icon
'Manage Profiles' text link below the cards
scene.action: Static UI mockup showing the profile selection screen in its default state with subtle hover suggestion on one profile
scene.location: Digital web browser or app frame showing the profile selection at desktop/TV resolution
scene.time_of_day: Evening ambiance suggested through the dark background and warm accent lighting
scene.mood: Warm family gathering, playful yet sophisticated, like choosing your spot on the family couch

composition.shot_type: Full screen UI mockup centered on the profile selection interface
composition.framing: Centered composition with the profiles arranged horizontally in the middle of the screen, logo above, and supplementary links below. Generous negative space around the profiles.

style.era_or_reference: Netflix profile selection elevated with boutique hotel warmth - personalized yet premium
style.color_palette: Deep night background (#0D0F14) with subtle ambient orbs, elevated surface cards (#1C2230), cinema gold accents (#D4A853) for hover states and active indicators, sage green for Kids badge, teal for Teen badge, warm white text (#F5F0E8)

lighting.description: Dark ambient background with very subtle, soft gradient orbs (gold and teal) floating in the background layer at extremely low opacity. Profile cards have subtle shadows suggesting depth. Hovered profile shows gold border glow.
lighting.color_and_contrast: High contrast between the dark background and the profile cards. Avatar icons are in muted cream, becoming gold on hover.

format.surface_or_output: Desktop/TV web app mockup at 1920x1080 or higher, could also work as a smart TV interface

constraints.factual_accuracy: Profile cards should be uniformly sized and properly spaced. Avatar icons should be clearly visible and playful but not childish.
constraints.safety_and_rights: Avatar icons should be generic/conceptual (simple outlined icons like animals, objects, shapes), not copyrighted characters.
